task.title: How to Make Dark Chocolate Sorbet
task.shortdesc: Are you allergic to milk? Don’t like ice cream? Try out this perfect receipe to indulge your sweet tooth.

ul.li: 4 Ounces of semisweet chocolate, chopped (or about ¾ cup of chocolate chips)
1 ½ Teaspoons of pure vanilla extract

p.b: This recipe will make about 8 cups (16 ½ cup servings).

step.cmd: Addwater, sugar, and salt to a medium saucepan set over medium-low heat to make syrup. Cookuntil the sugar is fully dissolved.
Putchocolate in a medium bowl and reserve while syrup continues to cook.
Addthe syrup and cocoa powder in a medium bowl. Whiskuntil smooth.
Pour>mixture over chopped chocolate. Let sitfor 5 minutes.
Coverand refrigerate for at least 2 hours/overnight, once the base mixture has returned to room temperature.
